document_data.name: Rastafan Dimetar
document_data.mainbody: '''Rastafan Dimetar''' was a courtier of [[Cormyr]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: In 1357 DR, news arrived in [[Suzail]] that runaway princess [[Alusair Obarskyr]] was seen near [[Tilverton]]. Rastafan was one of the many envoys sent by King [[Azoun Obarskyr IV]] to the [[Dalelands]] in order to recruit an adventuring party to find Alusair.
